name: Creation of PI after PR is Submitted
script:
if doc.docstatus == 1:
    purchase_invoice = frappe.new_doc("Purchase Invoice")
    
    # Set relevant fields from the Purchase Receipt
    purchase_invoice.supplier = doc.supplier
    purchase_invoice.posting_date = doc.posting_date
    purchase_invoice.company = doc.company
    
    # Set other fields as needed
    frappe.msgprint("Purchase Invoice is Created")
    # Add items from the Purchase Receipt to the Purchase Invoice
    for item in doc.items:
        invoice_item = purchase_invoice.append('items')
        invoice_item.item_code = item.item_code
        invoice_item.qty = item.qty
        invoice_item.rate = item.rate
        # Add other item details as needed
    
    # Save the Purchase Invoice
    purchase_invoice.insert()

name: Email send to User if invoice on Hold
script:
if doc.doctype == "Purchase Invoice" and doc.custom_effective_date and doc.hold_comment:
    
    owner_username = frappe.db.get_value("User",doc.owner,"username")
    username = frappe.db.get_value("User",frappe.session.user,"username")
    
    frappe.sendmail(
        recipients = doc.owner,
        subject='Purchase Invoice On Hold',
        template = 'purchase_invoice_onhold',
        sender = frappe.frappe.session.user,
        header=_("Purchase Invoice On Hold"),
        delayed=False,
        args={'doc': doc, 'owner_username':owner_username,'username':username}
    )
